methods.name: buildGroupRE

parameters.name: arr
parameters.summary: A single value or an array of values.

parameters.name: re
parameters.summary: A function. Takes one parameter and converts it to a regular expression.

parameters.name: nonCapture
parameters.summary: If true, uses non-capturing match, otherwise matches are retained by regular expression. Defaults to false

methods.summary: Builds a regular expression that groups subexpressions
methods.description: A utility function used by some of the RE generators. The subexpressions are constructed by the function, re, in the second parameter. re builds one subexpression for each elem in the array a, in the first parameter. Returns a string for a regular expression that groups all the subexpressions.

methods.name: escapeString

parameters.name: except
parameters.summary: a String with special characters to be left unescaped

methods.summary: Adds escape sequences for special characters in regular expressions

parameters.name: nonCapture
parameters.summary: If true, uses non-capturing match, otherwise matches are retained by regular expression.
